KitKat::
The autosystems started to alarm. INTRUDER ALERT INTRUDER ALERT 
INTRUDER ALERT. AUTOGUNS ARMED AND READY

KitKat heard the noise. "Great. More good news today." She opend her 
link,"DarkMouse, Report, what's going on?" She looked at her wrist 
monitor as saw that there was a strange bot at the 
entrance. "COMPUTER, Fire stun ray."

The autoguns focused on the intruder and fires stun rays at the bot.

DarkMouse::
She turned and looked at the bot just as the alarm was sounding off. 
She grabbed her gun and stood ready. She watched as the autoguns 
fired on the bot.


--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, wilddance_mare@h... wrote:
> Berserk:
> 
> 
> 
> 
> Berserk watched as a group of bots went into the base. He withdrew 
> his clash sword knowing he was going to get a fight out of this. He 
> stepped up to the entrance, catching the door before it closed. He 
> paused for a moment to make sure it was safe for him. He waited 
until 
> he thought the bots walked on into the base some more, then forced 
> the door back, and squeezed in as much of his large body could fit. 
> He held it with his foot, and fiddled with a panel on the side to 
> make it hang open halfway. He stepped inside, looking around.
